Dictionary.description:
-- Definition -- Information defining the specification used to create or derive this geographic position of the address.
-- Description -- NOTE 1 Multiple address points can be derived from one polygon spatial object.
NOTE 2 If the position of an address is derived from a polygon spatial object a number of different approaches is used.
EXAMPLE 1 The same point (e.g., centre point of the polygon) is used for each address, thus, multiple address points will be overlapping.
EXAMPLE 2 Each point position is unique within the polygon to be able to visually distinguish the representation of each address.

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying a postal delivery point.
Definition.name: postalDelivery

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying a point of utility service.
Definition.name: utilityService

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying the access point from the thoroughfare.
Definition.name: thoroughfareAccess

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying the entrance door or gate.
Definition.name: entrance

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying the related building.
Definition.name: building

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position aims at identifying the related land parcel.
Definition.name: parcel

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related segment of a thoroughfare.
Definition.name: segment

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related postcode area.
Definition.name: postalDescriptor

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related address area.
Definition.name: addressArea

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 1st order.
Definition.name: adminUnit1stOrder

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 2nd order.
Definition.name: adminUnit2ndOrder

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 3rd order.
Definition.name: adminUnit3rdOrder

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 4th order.
Definition.name: adminUnit4thOrder

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 5th order.
Definition.name: adminUnit5thOrder

Definition.description: -- Definition -- Position derived from the related administrative unit of 6th order.
Definition.name: adminUnit6thOrder
